Html:
as noted in the 2.3.11 changelog:

"- Rawr.Mage: Frost DPS Cycles with Frostfire Bolt on Brain Freeze DPS in 3.3.3 implemented. Fire Mage changes for 3.3.3 implemented."

bs it's been implemented

unless you forgot to change the tooltips.. burning soul threat reduction hasn't changed

fireball glyph hasn't been changed from crit into haste

and i don't know what else

but as far as i can eyeball it's identical to 2.3.10?

 

got me all excited that i could plan whether i should swap to fire post-patch..

Did you make sure that the 3.3.3 PTR check box was checked under the Options -> Advance tab? These changes would not be turned on  if you had not have that check box checked. The only PTR change that is not in yet is the fireball glyph change.

i definitely have the 3.3.3 checkbox ticked.

 

i'll mess with it some more if it's workign for other people.

Trust me in that the PTR changes ARE in the system. Yes, the tool tips if you hover over the talents are not updated in yet. The changes are in a temporary spot that can be added permanently whenever the patch goes through.  A good way to check that the PTR mode is working is to hover over the pyroblast damage. If that doesn't change from PTR to normal, then yes there is a problem, and you might want to submit a ticket about the problem.
